title: Privacy & Disclaimer
text:
This site does not use cookies or track visitors. No personal information is collected unless you contact me via forms or email.




The information provided here is for informational purposes only.

While care is taken to ensure accuracy, no guarantees are made regarding completeness or suitability.

Any external links do not imply endorsement of those sites.

If you have concerns regarding your privacy or site content, please contact me.

title: Dr Ian Henry ‚Äì Data, Leadership & Science
text:
Dr Ian Henry, PhD, MBA, CMgr FCMI
Data & Analytics Leader ¬∑ Coach ¬∑ Consultant ¬∑ Educator
With over 15 years of experience in data science, leadership, and education, I help individuals and organisations turn data and insight into growth ‚Äî from developing foundational skills to driving large-scale transformation.
My work bridges science, technology, and human development, combining technical rigour with strategic and coaching expertise to enable meaningful, measurable impact.




Data ¬∑ Insight ¬∑ Growth


Empowering people and organisations to learn, lead, and transform





Explore My Work


Tutoring & Mentoring  
For students and researchers
Build scientific and analytical skills with tailored tutoring and academic mentoring ‚Äî from A-Levels to postgraduate research.

Strengthen understanding in biology, chemistry, physics, and data science

Develop programming and analysis skills (Python, R, bioinformatics)

Gain confidence in exams, research, and academic writing

Explore Tutoring ‚Üí


Coaching & Leadership Development  
For professionals and emerging leaders
Unlock clarity, confidence, and impact through personalised coaching in career, leadership, and personal growth.

Develop authentic leadership and decision-making skills

Navigate career transitions and professional challenges

Build resilience, focus, and performance in complex environments

Explore Coaching ‚Üí


Consulting & Data Strategy  
For organisations and teams
Delivering actionable strategies for digital transformation, AI adoption, and scientific data management.

Design and implement scalable data strategies and FAIR governance

Integrate analytics and machine learning into R&D workflows

Build capability, culture, and sustainability in data-driven teams

Explore Consulting ‚Üí





About My Approach


Interdisciplinary Expertise  
Experience across academia and industry ‚Äî including roles at AstraZeneca, the Max Planck Institute, and the University of Edinburgh ‚Äî combining scientific depth with leadership practice and business insight.


Integrated Perspective  
A unified approach that connects learning, leadership, and strategy ‚Äî helping individuals and organisations grow from technical mastery to confident, values-driven impact.


Evidence-Based Practice  
Grounded in data, psychology, and systems thinking ‚Äî translating complexity into clarity, and insight into sustainable action.





Get in Touch


Connect 
Whether you‚Äôre a student, professional, or organisation, I‚Äôd be happy to discuss how I can support your goals.
üìß Email: contact@drianhenry.co.uk
üåê Book online: Contact Form ‚Üí


Collaboration 
Open to partnerships in education, leadership development, and data strategy projects ‚Äî bridging technical and human dimensions of change.


Follow 
Stay updated on insights across science, leadership, and data transformation.
LinkedIn ‚Üí
GitHub ‚Üí

title: About Dr Ian Henry ‚Äì Data & Analytics Leader
text:
Integrating analytical insight with human development





I‚Äôm a computational biologist, data science leader, and educator passionate about how data and people transform ideas into impact.
With over 15 years of experience spanning academia, biotech, and corporate R&D, I‚Äôve worked at the intersection of science, analytics, and leadership ‚Äî guiding individuals, teams, and organisations to grow through evidence, clarity, and collaboration.
I currently lead data science for Translational Medicine at AstraZeneca, applying data-driven insights to accelerate discovery and development in healthcare.
Alongside this, I mentor and coach scientists, professionals, and leaders through my independent tutoring, coaching, and consulting practice.








PhD in Genomics / Computational Biology ‚Äì University of Nottingham

BSc in Molecular Biology ‚Äì University of Edinburgh

Research at the Max Planck Institute for Molecular Cell Biology & Genetics

Published 25+ scientific papers in leading journals





MBA (Distinction) ‚Äì Hult International Business School

CMgr FCMI ‚Äì Chartered Management Institute (Senior Leaders Master‚Äôs, Distinction)

Led global analytics initiatives at AstraZeneca and European research institutions

Experienced in cross-functional project leadership and digital transformation





Tutoring and mentoring students from A-Level to postdoctoral level

Career and leadership coaching for scientists and professionals

Strategic consulting in data science, AI, and digital transformation

Proven record in combining technical and human development







My work is guided by three principles:

Clarity through Data ‚Äî turning complexity into insight and insight into impact.

Growth through Learning ‚Äî empowering individuals to understand, adapt, and lead.

Connection through Collaboration ‚Äî bridging disciplines, cultures, and perspectives to drive change.

Whether teaching, coaching, or consulting, I aim to bring structure, empathy, and evidence-based thinking to every interaction.




Interested in collaborating or learning more about my work?
üìß Email: contact@drianhenry.co.uk
üíº LinkedIn ‚Üí
üåê Explore My Work ‚Üí




Discover how tutoring, coaching, and consulting connect across science, leadership, and data.


Tutoring ‚Üí ¬∑ Coaching ‚Üí ¬∑ Consulting ‚Üí
